title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
**Product Name:** 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor

**Design:** This beautiful set of wall decor features a unique 'circle on circles' design, adding a modern and artistic touch to your space. The set includes 2 mirrors, each with a versatile design that allows for free styling and combination with other wall art.

**Size:** The mirrors have a diameter of 15.7 inches including the frame, while the mirror itself measures 10 inches in diameter.

**Frame:** The frame is made of sturdy iron, with a gold finish that is between matte and bright, adding a touch of sophistication to any room.

**Installation:** These mirrors are easy to install, requiring just a single screw for hanging.

**Weight:** Each mirror weighs 2lb, making them lightweight yet sturdy.

**Glass Quality:** The mirrors are made of high-quality annealed glass, ensuring durability and preventing warping and distortion. The HD imaging ensures a clear reflection.

**Versatility:** These mirrors are incredibly versatile and can match various decoration styles. They are suitable for use in the living room, bedroom, bathroom, entryway, or office space. They can be styled independently or combined with other wall art such as paintings, wall sculptures, or candle sconces.

**Package:** The mirrors come in a decent package for safe delivery, ensuring they arrive at your doorstep in pristine condition.

Transform your space with these beautiful and versatile gold circle mirrors!
